name: Bound (itch) (craigduthie, callioperyder, EloiseCarr)
description:
A puzzle game created by 2 programmers and 3 artists, We were able to choose a few themes before creating a game, the themes chosen for this were Minimalism and One-Button (almost). This was done in one week.

Credits:

Craig Duthie (Programmer)

Eloise Carr (Design, Programmer, UI)

Calliope Ryder, (Design and Artist) @callioperyder

Ben Walden (Artist) @benmwalden

Jacob Copper (Artist)
